document_data.name: The Halanthor
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2024-1-6 - Andred Kuroone, Lurandural Veltree, Jhalanavress Tanthavur, and Orstrar Galannavruk}}
document_data.mainbody: '''The Halanthor''' was the local merchants' guild of [[Scornubel]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the late 1490s DR, representatives of The Halanthor included the [[half-elf]] named [[Lurandural Veltree]] who did business with [[Andred Kuroone]] and [[Orstrar Galannavruk]], dried sundries merchants of [[Zazesspur]]. Goods traded included [[thael leaf]], [[herb]]s, [[spice]]s, and dried [[apricot]]s.
